DOC.brief_summary: G9a protein was approved to be highly associated with recurrence of breast cancer, gastric cancer, hepatocellular cancer, prostate cancer and lung cancer. Therefore, the aim of this study was to clarify the association and G9a protein and cervical cancer by analyzing the immunohistochemical staining of G9a protein to the histopathologic specimen of cervical cancer and clinical data.
DOC.brief_title: The Association of G9a Protein and the Outcome of Patients With Cervical Cancer
